Quando você percebe gastou 200 reais em skin

I have been playing this game for nearly as long as it has been out. It is one of the most engaging and consistently evolving games I have ever played. I love horror and to get to play as some horror icons i love really brings it home for me. Behaviour has really worked their butt off to give an outstanding experience for any horror fan. Sure there are bugs in the game and it may seem one sided in game-play every now and then, but I feel it is fun either way and sometimes funny when unexpected things happen. Overall give this game a chance and just have fun. I promise you will enjoy yourself if horror is your genre of choice.
fun to play (im in denial please help me)

I like the game most likely top 3 of all time, however, the games fun can easily go and the grind can usually also die quick. Im not sure why theres  no reward for devotion level ups which is stupid. The game itself is alot of fun however it can theres so many ways people can kill it. For example the ways killers play and teammates.

Bon jeu qui permet de s'amuser de bien des manières selon notre style de jeu ou si l'on préfère être tueur ou survivant, la diversité des deux camps est d'ailleurs une très bonne chose.
Seul point négatif, certain joueur (survivants) joue le jeu comme si leur vie en dépendait ce qui empêche le tueur d'avoir une bonne expérience de jeu, mis a part cela le jeu est très bien dans son ensemble.

When I was a kid, me and my friend invented a game that was close to the concept of "Dead by Daylight". Someone was the killer and has to catch all the others, but before everyoune gets 1 minute to hide. This game gives me nostalgic feelings that's one of the reasons why I like it. Of course "DbD" isn't perfect, bugs, cheaters, balace and toxic community, but I like this game. Playing as a Survivor requires more skill, but as a killer you have to mindgame your prey. Also the elements of horror are attractive to me. This game isn't suited for everyone, but I recommend it, at least just to try it, maybe it will catch your attention.

Final score: 8.5/10
got the game just to be chased by pyramid head. 10/10

Well, for all those new players landing on this game:
.- Be ready to get frustrated
.- Be ready to get mad
.- Be ready to rage quit, smash your keyboard or controller to pieces
.- Be prepared to take a lot of salt

But most of all, be ready to enjoy one of the best asymmetrical survival games in the gaming world (if not the best).
Yes, DBD can be all those bad things you heard about, but also once you learn how this game works, it can be a very rewarding experience.

Best played with friends and background music, DBD will give you hours of jump scares, accelerated heartbeats, lot of fun and maybe a slammed monitor.
This game is fucking shit, never buy it

Bought it so I could play with my friends, but now here I am playing the game on my own which rarely happens. Recommend this if you are into repetitive type multiplayer games where the fun comes with who you are matched with rather than dense game mechanics.

A fun versus and team game. While the community deals with some toxicity and the dev team often deviates from what the community wants for the game, it is still a fun experience, especially with friends. It does have a somewhat steep skill curve at the start, but once you get used to the mechanics, many characters aren't difficult to learn.

This game is one massive headache, game in game out if you don't play killer you will have a terrible time, The game favours the killers massively, when it comes to map layout, hooks, and range. Killers are never short of places to hook people, No matter how hard you wiggle. Over 30 hours in and I just get mad and wanna punch a hole thru my monitor. I have high level survivors, no perks are any life savers, all just fill the void for the selling point of  exp progression. Yeh its fun for 1 or 2 games "with friends" afterwards it just leaves a taste of piss in your mouth. Would rather scrub my wrist with sandpaper. There is no voice chat, or text chat in game. Probs to stop all the ppl wanting to rage out at the killers. Team members either leave you to get smacked up or just hold u down. Fix your game. For some good pointers, Remove so meany hooks, make wiggles easier to get off, Even make gens longer if you need something to throw at all the tryhard killers before they cry about a patch. No thanks, dont buy.
o jogo é bom, mais se prepara pra passar raiva kkk
Cooles Spiel, je älter es wird, umso besser wird es auch

The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results. I've come to learn the true meaning of this by continuing to play this nightmare of a game. 10/10

What i disliked: i didn't liked how the fps and the performances on DBD was slow, all i wanted was to play and have fun with good performances... i am trying my best to try to get rid of the glitches and make the fps way higher without and bugs or lags 

What i liked abt this game: i highly recommend this game for others who has the bravery and courage to face their fears eg. killers, surviving and running away with no contempt, this game is also very exciting and has lots of new stuff almost every year! I love this game so much I tell so many of my friends to play this! this game can be scary sometimes... But can be very fun, because you can play with friends and others you haven't met! but i don't recommend playing this game all the time, because sometimes you can get scared in real life or have nightmares, please be careful with your choices, i only recommend this game above 14 yrs, i am not saying people under 14 shouldn't play, people under should just be careful on waht they're doing, but on the bright side, there is nothing to fear, either play it or not. Thank you so much for playing DBD ( Dead By Daylight) 

regards 
   nanoktumanday
